content: संसृज् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To mix, mingle, unite with, bring in contact with; संसृज्यते सरसिजैररुणांशुभिन्नैः <ls>R. 5. 69.</ls> अस्ना रक्षः संसृजतात् <ls>Ait. Br.</ls> {@--2@} To join, meet; सौमित्रिणा तदनु संससृजे <ls>R. 13. 73</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 74.</ls> {@--3@} To create, form. {@--4@} To endow or furnish with.
